data.system_settings: ASUS Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: The Spotify presence from your earlier account gets passed over to the new one (not local)
data.expected_result: There should be nothing out of the ordinary
data.short_description: Spotify statuses pass over to other accounts even if they don't have Spotify connected
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 2 accounts on the same device, one connected to Spotify and the other not. - Play a song on the connected account and listen for a while until discord detects it  - Listen for some more time and switch accounts on the same device  - Check your profile
